-- | Quasi-quoter for Happy parsers
--   
@package happy-meta
@version 0.2.0.8

module Text.Happy.Quote
parseHappy :: String -> Happy
parseHappyInfo :: String -> (Happy, HappyInfo)
compileHappy :: Happy -> Q [Dec]
happy :: QuasiQuoter
data HappyStk a
HappyStk :: a -> (HappyStk a) -> HappyStk a
data HappyInfo
happyWarn :: HappyInfo -> Q ()
